content:
Wachsmacher family

1 Herschel WACHSMACHER               1793-95 (Mendel)
 + Rywka Lea                         1794-97 (Juda)

  2x Samuel WACHSMACHER              - 1825 #7
  2o Hanna WACHSMACHER               1822 #192 - 1823 #209
  2o Chawa WACHSMACHER               1824 #122 - 1824 #73

     3o Chane Mariem WACHSMACHER     Mar 1, 1863 (1864 #329)
       * Abraham TAUBMAN             1845 Mogilany - Mar 13, 1918
             married Mar 22, 1892 #44

          * Zygmund GADEL            1891 #119 Przemysl
                banns 1918 #680

     3x Aszer Abraham WACHSMACHER    Jan 3, 1866 Krakow
     3x Samuel WACHSMACHER        Dec 3, 1867* #335
       + Bluma LOBZOWER              1872 #738
             married Aug 4, 1895 #119
        4x Alter Jozef WACHSMACHER   May 25, 1896 #388
        4o Anna WACHSMACHER          Aug 22, 1897 #563 - after 1945
          * Salomon FRIEDIKER        Jul 11, 1881 Chrzanow - after 1935
                married Prog.Syn Apr 10, 1921 #562
          * unknown MAKOWSKA 
        4x Leon WACHSMACHER          Oct 30, 1898 #754 - after 1929
